message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. It's a fantastic opportunity for your business. My starting price is $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the value it would bring to my business.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to go that low right now.  $1,200,000 is my absolute minimum, but I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $1,300,000.  This product is truly unique and offers significant value to your business.  Let's find a way to make this work.

I understand that you're trying to make a profit, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll propose $1,150,000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
